offenses.message: Metrics/MethodLength: Method has too many lines. [36/30]
Metrics/ClassLength: Class has too many lines. [325/250]
Lint/UnusedMethodArgument: Unused method argument - `other_keyword_args`. If it's necessary, use `_` or `_other_keyword_args` as an argument name to indicate that it won't be used.
Lint/UnusedMethodArgument: Unused method argument - `other_keyword_args`. If it's necessary, use `_` or `_other_keyword_args` as an argument name to indicate that it won't be used.
Lint/UnreachableCode: Unreachable code detected.
Lint/DuplicateMethods: Method `SeedHelper#regions` is defined at both db/seed_helpers.rb:32 and db/seed_helpers.rb:287.
Lint/DuplicateMethods: Method `SeedHelper#kommuns` is defined at both db/seed_helpers.rb:32 and db/seed_helpers.rb:292.

Metrics/BlockNesting: Avoid more than 4 levels of block nesting.
Lint/Void: Variable `new_user` used in void context.
Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity: Cyclomatic complexity for get_path is too high. [39/36]
Lint/AmbiguousRegexpLiteral: Ambiguous regexp literal. Parenthesize the method arguments if it's surely a regexp literal, or add a whitespace to the right of the `/` if it should be a division.
